name: Retro Arcade: Protober
description:
oct 1 - Rafalaga (Galaga style space shooter)

oct 2 - RAFman (pacman clone)

oct 3 - Block Breaker Invasion

oct 4 - Rafatron

oct 5 -Rafa City Ransom

oct 6 -The Legend of Shotgun Puppy

oct 7 - KnockOut

oct 8 - Attacker: A space adventure

oct 9 - Car Hunter

oct 10 - The program that runs the anthology of games was made along with all the menus that run through all the games.
